Fault Finding & Repairs

Electrical Emergency?

If you smell burning, see sparks, or have a complete power loss, call us immediately.

Common Electrical Faults We Fix

Tripping RCD/MCB

Circuit breakers that keep tripping, often caused by faulty appliances or damaged wiring.

Power Outages

Partial or complete power loss, dead sockets, and circuits not working.

Lighting Problems

Lights not working, flickering lights, or switches not functioning properly.

Socket Issues

Dead sockets, loose connections, or sockets that spark when used.

Burning Smells

Electrical burning smells from sockets, switches, or consumer units.

Our Fault Finding Process

1

Safety First

Immediate safety assessment and isolation of dangerous circuits if needed.

2

Initial Investigation

Visual inspection and discussion about when the problem started and any recent changes.

3

Advanced Testing

Using professional test equipment to pinpoint the exact location and cause of the fault.

4

Clear Explanation

We explain what we've found and provide options for repair with transparent pricing.

5

Professional Repair

Safe, permanent repairs using quality materials and proper certification.

When to Call an Emergency Electrician

Call immediately if you experience:

  • Burning smells from electrical equipment
  • Sparks or arcing from sockets or switches
  • Electric shocks from appliances or switches
  • Complete power loss with no obvious cause
  • Warm or hot electrical fittings
